thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Mauro Manzano
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Mauro Manzano

author: Mauro Manzano
title: Mauro Manzano
text: We have been using PRTG for a year now to monitor internal and external devices across our offices. The software is reliable and the interface is very useful to manage. We also have options to create personalized maps and dashboards providing a simple view of the network.
